title: Catholick communion defended against both extreams, and unnecessary division confuted in five parts ... / by Richard Baxter ...
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
notes: Part 1 has special t.p. and imprint date, 1683; pts. 2 and 5 each have special title pages.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

(from t.p.) I. The dangerous schismatick, on the three cases about church-communion -- II. Animadversions on part of Mr. Raphson's book -- III. A survey of the unreasonble defender of Dr. Stillingfleet, for separation, pretending to oppose it -- IV. Reasons of the authors censured communion with the parish-churches -- V. The reasons why Dr. J.O.'s twelve arguments change not his judgment.
